item.title: Prepare week 1
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Tuesday August 30 Nothing to prepare Thursday August 31 Watch data and visualization Read (optional): section 1

item.title: Prepare week 2
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Tuesday September 6 Watch Visualizing data with ggplot2 Read (optional): section 4 and 5 Thursday September 8 Watch Visualizing numerical data Watch Visualizing categorical data Read (optional): section 4 and 5

item.title: Prepare week 3
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Tuesday September 13 Watch Working with multiple data frames Thursday September 15 Read section 7.1, 7.2: Linear regression with a single predictor

item.title: Prepare week 4
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Tuesday September 20 Watch (optional review) The language of models Watch Fitting and interpreting models Thursday September 22 Watch Models with multiple predictors Read (optional): chapter 8: linear regression with multiple predictors

item.title: Prepare week 5
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Tuesday September 27 Nothing to prepare! Thursday September 29 Watch Logistic Regression Watch StringR Read (optional): chapter 9: logistic regression

item.title: Prepare week 6
item.description: To complete by the beginning of class on the specified day: Tuesday October 4 No required prepare. Read (optional) review: Chapter 10 Applications: Model Thursday October 6 TBD
